snippet: There was magic in the air at the Eyebeam Art and Technology Center in Chelsea, when a new piece by Eli Keszler, “L-Carrier,” was introduced before a rapt audience.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews premiere of Eli Keszler's new music composition L-Carrier at the Eyebeam Art and Technology Center.
lead_paragraph: There was magic in the air at the Eyebeam Art and Technology Center in Chelsea, when a new piece by Eli Keszler, “L-Carrier,” was introduced before a rapt audience.

headline.seo: Eli Keszler’s ‘L-Carrier’ at Eyebeam in Chelsea
headline.main: Ensemble With Piano Wires, Off the Wall and Ceiling
headline.print_headline: An Ensemble Attuned to the Pangs of Piano Wires
